gurmukhi: hsq hsq pUCY his his kY hswie rovq rovq pUCY roie Aau ruvwie kY
transliteration: Hasat Hasat Poochhai Hasi Hasi Kai Hasaai , Rovat Rovat Poochhai Roi Au Ruvaai Kai ?
translation: A laughing person merrily asks a happy and laughing person various things that can make them laugh. Similarly a crying person asks another crying person matters that causes crying.

gurmukhi: bYTY bYTY pUCY bYiT bYiT kY inkit jwie cwlq cwlq pUCY dhids Dwie kY
transliteration: Baitthai Baitthai Poochhai Baitthi Baitthi Kai Nikati Jaai , Chaalat Chaalat Poochhai Dahadis Dhaai Kai ?
translation: A settled person will share with another settled person means of settling down. A person treading a path will ask another on the right path, things that would lead one to the right path.

gurmukhi: log pUCy logwcwr byd pUCY byd ibiD jogI BogI jog Bog jugiq jugwie kY
transliteration: Log Poochhay Logaachaar Bayd Poochhai Bayd Bidhi , Jogee Bhogee Jog Bhog Jougati Jougaai Kai ?
translation: A worldly person asks the other worldly persons various aspects of worldly affairs. One who studies Vedas would ask about Vedas from another who has the knowledge of Vedas.

gurmukhi: jnm mrn BRm kwhU n imtwey swikE inihcl Bey gur crn smwie kY ]438]
transliteration: Janam Maran Bhram Kaahoo N Mitaaay Saakiao , Nihichal Bhaay Gur Charan Samaai Kai ?438?
translation: All the above do satiate the addiction of a person, but no one has been able to end the birth-death cycle of anyone by such prattles. Those who unite their attention in the holy feet of the Lord, only those obedient disciples of the Guru are able to end t
